amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike several sections in the small business title of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 as printed in House Report 105-573 to modify the small business subtitle; restore the right of an individual debtor to count debt as disposable income; and to strike paperwork and other bureaucratic burdens.

action.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 290 (Roll No. 219).
